评论概述: cute blouse, tts but not as oversized as shown in product photos
评论详情: This blouse is super cute with a retro print on it. The colors are vivid and as crisp as in the product photos. The top is true to size but not nearly as over sized as is shown in the product photos. If you want a super over sized fit like shown you should order up by one size. However, if you want a normal but loose fit just order your usual size.  I got this in my normal size small. I am 5 feet tall, 115 lbs, 32d bra size, 26 inch waist. The small fit me comfortably loose but not as oversized as in the product photos. It is a good fit just not quite as shown in the photos. I do wish they would specify if the fit needs one size bigger to achieve.  4 stars

Got the pink/red/orange mix, which looks exactly as pictured.  As seller has indicated, blouse does run large and it's recommended to order one size down, which I did. The Large more than fit (5'4", big chested 145 lbs), with considerable "flow" at the waist and hips.  Smocked sleeves are a nice feature because it allows me to push sleeves up to my preferred 3/4 length.  Material is a bit wrinkled, which I hope will wash/dry out.
Fits well. Picture as described.

Redheads like me live by one immutable fashion rule: You’re never allowed to wear pink. Until, that is, the day you say, Eff that, and wear what you want. That’s how I happened to order this shirt in a color I never, ever wear, and I can hardly express what a kick I get out of wearing it. It really makes me feel like a scofflaw. 😃 The shirt is cut true to size—perhaps even a little on the large side. My only objection is the fabric, which is plasticky and artificial, so for that, I deducted a star.
This is a comfortable oversized button down. I like the elastic cuffed sleeves as it adds a feminine touch.

Zeagoo is one of my favorite brands from Amazon, always have elegant designs and they use beautiful fabric and unique patterns. I chose this simple stripe pattern because I like classics. Can never go wrong with this. Versatile, goes with shorts, jeans, pants, skirts. You can style this top in so many ways and wear to many different events.

This blouse is soft. comfortable, easy care, well made, true to size and the colors are as advertised.  Easy to launder and looks great right out of the low temperature dryer.  Excellent quality, good value- suitable for gifting.

I was excited about this top, as it was all over social media reels as a super comfy and stylish option. The color is great, and yes the stripes are blue (but almost so blue they look black). The photos do look almost identical to the ones on the viral reels, but this top is not what you're looking for. Yes, you can size down and it fits. There are no side pockets, and for the love of all that is good in this world, these smocked sleeves are basically a stylish blood pressure cuff. They are SO tight!!!! This isn't the one.

This is a nice trendy comfortable blouse for any season/occasion. Like the floral pattern on shirt - very vivid and eye-catching. Fabric is soft, breathable and not too thin/thick. The lantern sleeve is long enough and would pair well with tighter pants/leggings and denim jacket. The blouse is well made with nicely finished seaming. Recommend

评论概述: It’s very cute and I love the sleeves
评论详情: That’s a very nice dress shirt that has a little puffed up sleeves and the elastic surround the rest are nice and comfortable. Not too tight. It adds a little more different of a dress shirt. It’s nice. I didn’t realize it has stripes, but it’s pink with white stripes, it is wrinkly so next time I am gonna try to get it out of the dryer as soon as the dryer is done because I don’t like ironing, it fits nice. I wish it was a little softer, but I like the color and the design.

This is a lovely burst of vibrant colors. I love the orange and hot pink. The ruffles and gathering on the wrist ps is very charming.  The shirt is very feminine and chic. It’s also very soft to the touch. You could wear this shirt in all seasons. It looks nice paired with bracelets and necklaces. It also pairs nicely with slacks or jeans.

This shirt has classic menswear elements, but the smocked cuffs, relaxed fit and stripes in cute colors give it a more feminine vibe for women. I chose the one with green and white stripes and the green is fairly dark, but it's broken up by equal amounts of white so it comes off as less dark. I love how the crisp contrast of the stripes sets off the softer cut of the shirt. The fabric is thin and soft, so it is cool and drapes nicely. It looks like cotton shirting fabric but it is 65% polyester which gives it more of a synthetic feel even though it looks like cotton. The buttons are plastic but have a pretty pearly look that is slightly translucent. They blend right in and don't detract or add much to the shirt, but they do look nice. The smocked wrists make interesting patterns with the striped fabric.  As I expected, this shirt was fairly wrinkled when it arrived, but a quick ironing smoothed out easily for a crisp and tidy look. If you try it on right out of the bag and don't like it, give the shirt a nice pressing before giving up on it. It made a huge difference, in my opinion. The shirttail hem is a few inches longer in back which I prefer, because I usually wear this type of shirt untucked and I just like the look of a slightly longer tail in back. But because the fabric is soft and thin, it's perfect for tucking in. I like the box pleat in back for a little added fullness in the fit.  I'd say this shirt runs true to size, but keep in mind that is for a relaxed fit. It washes nicely; I've only washed it once so far. I machine-washed it in cold water and hung it to dry on a hanger. I don't think it will shrink since it is 65% polyester and 35% cotton, but it fits just how I like, so I don't want to risk shrinking it in the dryer.  Overall, this bouse is a nice choice for menswear button-down stripes with a relaxed fit and some feminine touches. It's both soft and crisp. It can be dressed down for weekends or dressed up for work.
Looking for a fall colored long sleve and found this. Fabric is great and well done. I highly recommend.

评论概述: Ugh, I really liked it but…
评论详情: Cute shirt, liked the fabric, color, and the pinstripes. Fit was also good, true to size. My only complaint is the look of the shirt is ruined by the smock stitching. I love the smocking, but rather than lining up the pinstripe, they just sewed. Just didn’t like the way it looks. I will return and purchase a solid color. Ugh

Review for: Zeagoo Women's Button Down Shirts Loose Fit Striped Printed Lantern Long Sleeve Blouses Smocked C  This is a pretty button up top with a super cute smocked sleeve that gives it a little something extra. The fabric has almost like a windbreaker type feeling to it, in that it is very lightweight but not very breathable. The clack and white stripes are so close together that it looks more like a patterned shirt, not a striped black and white. It is true to size.  As a Vine reviewer I try to provide good information. My scale: Most things will start at 4 stars. It gets that extra star only if it is outstanding. It loses stars for issues- bad sizing, poor quality. One star if is is not suitable for purpose or for gross misrepresentation.

This top is so pretty and classy. It has a thickness.. not see-through. Button up with flowy sleeves and beautiful multi tones. Personally I feel it ran a little small and would size up as it's not stretchy.

Love this blue striped button down.  The sleeves are the lantern fit which gives it a trendy style with a classic look.  It does run a little big if you are in between sizes.  The material is well made and very happy with it.  It is light weight and washes well.  I do hang dry the shirt.

I wore this blouse only bcuz I had no other pink blouse and needed the blouse but the cut is so off that I’m amazed no one has complained. I had to disguise the crazy blouse and couldn’t wait to get home where I immediately tossed the worthless blouse into the trash to hopefully never see that embarrassment again. The Zeagoo Women's Button Down Shirt is a really cute and versatile piece! The striped design works just as well in the office as it does for casual outings. I also like wearing it open over a tank top or camisole. The fabric is soft and lightweight. The V-neck is flattering, and while the smocked elastic cuffs aren't entirely my style, they do add a unique touch. That's just personal preference, though. Overall, it's a stylish and comfortable shirt that’s perfect for pairing with jeans, skirts, or trousers. Recommended!
